title: Supreme Court Allows Ballot Selfies in New Hampshire (Audio)
itunes:title: Supreme Court Allows Ballot Selfies in New Hampshire (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Greg Stohr, Bloomberg News Supreme Court reporter and co-host of Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law," discusses the news of the day from the Supreme Court. He speaks with Bloomberg's Michael Best.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
